item.title: Fyre Festival's embattled founder is selling the brand: 'It's time to pass the torch'
item.description: Billy McFarland says he will sell the brand "to an operator that can fully realize its vision." The news comes days after the postponement of Fyre Fes...

item.title: House oversight committee demands answers on gutting of CDC public records office
item.description: House Rep. Gerry Connolly is pushing CDC leadership to explain why the personnel who handle FOIA requests lost their jobs, noting that that the public...

item.title: Mercury, Venus and Saturn to delight stargazers in a parade across the sky
item.description: The pre-dawn sky will feature a glowing crescent moon, joined by planets Mercury, Venus and Saturn.

item.title: How to get older men to socialize is a puzzle. A group called ROMEO is one answer
item.description: ROMEO stands for "retired older men eating out," and it's helping guys in one Maine town get out of the house and into more friendships.

item.title: Wrong turn leads to hundreds of immigrant arrests at the Detroit-Canada border bridge
